data.name: Dungeon Scavenger 2
data.detailed_description:
The world ended. Only habitable place left is the entrance of the dungeon. It is up to you to rebuild and create hope for your small group left. Delve in the depths for the materials and resources to survive. This time though, you brought friends...

Dungeon Scavenger returns with improved looks and multiplayer capabilities.
  • Improved 3D graphics, now able to fully explore the dungeon in real time.
  • Up to 4 players can join together and combat the dungeon denizens.
  • 12 classes make a comeback improved and ready.
  • Charm any minion in the game and make it your pet.
  • Fast paced turn combat with visible timelines.
  • Procedurally generated 3D dungeons that can be explored in real time.
  • New item improvement system, to keep that gear you love upgraded.
  • Touch and joystick friendly.
  • Color blind friendly settings.
  • Steam Deck ready.

data.short_description: The adventure continues! With the help of you friends and your trusty charmed companions, venture forth in the new unknown depts. Build a new town like never before with your real life friends and band together to conquer the new depths.
